Description: Newly built three bedroom that has a lower level that can be used as a 4th bedroom or as an office/den space. Gorgeous property with large windows in every room which creates breathtaking views of the ocean. This unit features hardwood floors throughout, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and in unit laundry. There are 2 garage spaces included in the rent, with additional parking in the driveway. Located along the shore of Winthrop Beach with easy access to the golf course, grocery stores, and other local amenities. This is a must see!
